version_description:
Added favorite icon indicator in the thumbnail view
Bug fixing

- fixed crashes in iOS 9.0-9.2
- sleep mode is now turned off while reading in auto scroll mode
- fixed bug concerning depiction of book covers
- improvement to stability
- further improvements

- Added Book's Collections
- Dropbox file upload support
- OPDS with authentication
- Support for iOS 10.3
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixing

- Better OPDS support
- Improved scroll mode
- Bugfixes

- Better OPDS support
- Improved scroll mode
- Bugfixes

- Book reading improvements and fixes
- Bugfixes

- new design with book list widgets on Home screen
- simple navigation for different book lists
- possibility to change theme (icon colors) in the app
- possibility to use different Cloud accounts at the same time
- Bookland store and ReadRate service temporarily inaccessible
- access to Google Books account
- improved work with Dropbox
- new fonts added
- bugfixes
